questions.quote: I didn't have a deal! They're two hundred dollars a pop. What do I do?
I don't care about the sauce. It came in this funny little bottle, and there was a guy on the label that looked exactly like Charles Grodin.
I have a receipt for a rental car with your signature. Including a report with some damage to the rear seat. It seems the spring was so compressed it completely collapsed the right side..
You stuck your hand out, so I shook it. I don't know about a pact. Anyway, you should be happy you're engaged. You're getting married.
you would not believe what just happened to me in the bathroom
Women go after doctors like men go after models. They want someone with knowledge of the body.. we just want the body.
I can't believe you're hoarding sex moves. I'm out there rubbing two sticks together. You walk around with a zippo.
We gotta find that rickshaw. You check the sewers and dumpsters. I'll hit the soup kitchens, bakeries, and smorgasbords.
That's incredible. Six months ago you were taking messages for your mother.
Well, there's only one way to settle this.  One spot, two spot, zig, zag, tear, pop-die, pennygot, tennyum, tear, harum, scare 'em, rip 'em, tear 'em, tay, taw, toe..
